OOC: Well re writting his bio. in fact I'll pot it today. He's around 
12 feet in beast and robot mode.

Shivah:

"How strange are Decepticons..."thought Shivah while he arrived to  
CF and joined agains to Drakonbots in order to fight against 
Broterhood and NDE.




--- In nbwrpg@y..., ragnus_@h... wrote:
> OOC: roughly how big is Shivah? I couldn't find his bio on the 
site...
> 
> BIC:
> Ragnus watched as the other Dragon flew away.  Processing the co-
> ordinates, he absorbed a last bit of energon before leaving on his 
> long journey to the base.  During his flight he planned for what 
was 
> to come, making sure his weapons were ready and adjusting his 
> scanners.  After all he was not a trusting robot, and of coure, he 
> was expecting a trap.

> >

this

base

I
